## Editor.Rules.TemplatedJsonEditorRule class

The [Templated JSON editor rule](./ts-json.editor.rules.templatedjsoneditorrule.md) applies mustache rendering as appropriate to any keys or values in the object being edited.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TemplatedJsonEditorRule extends JsonEditorRuleBase 
```
**Extends:** [JsonEditorRuleBase](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorrulebase.md)
